actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal, in the case of certain wearing apparel and nonrubber footwear, the special tariff treatment accorded to articles assembled abroad with components produced in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to exempt wearing apparel and footwear from the tariff provisions applicable to articles assembled abroad with components produced in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal, in the case of certain wearing apparel and nonrubber footwear, the special tariff treatment accorded to articles assembled abroad with components produced in the United States.
